snippet.title: Final Fantasy VII Remake - The Game Awards 2019 Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/final-fantasy-vii-remake/?emcid=or-1s-412983

Originally hired by the resistance group Avalanche in their fight against the sinister Shinra Corporation, Cloud Strife becomes embroiled in a much deeper conflict and proves he’s more than just a mere mercenary. 

Get an introduction to this iconic hero in this new trailer shown during The Game Awards, and get ready to experience more of his story when FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE launches Worldwide for PS4 on March 3, 2020.
